sense.name: Be productive or fruitful
sense.examples: With the idea that their blook might fructify the crops and fields. Her blook would fructify the land before you could say chthonic. The foundations of selfhood fructify an unbounded field of consciousness. The seeds fructified. The earth that he fructified bore fruit enough to sustain him. The apple trees fructify. These seeds fructify in dry soil. I have a plan that should fructify, though it may take many years.
